page.title: 16WARD ROOM,H.M.S.SULTAN.
page.content: There are 400{officers}at H.M.S Sultan.It is mainly an{engineering establishment,but school teachers and medical officers also train here. At the moment there is a huge improvement and extension programme costing over Â£6,000,000,because of this about 15 men are living here,but when it is rebuilt there will be about 100 men living here. All of the officers live in luxury with a cabin of their own.Every lounge is very spacious and well furnished.Excellent sport facilities are nearby where they can play tennis, football,rugby,cricket,hockey and there is a running track.Every year they have a special charity event.This year's event lasted two days.It included bike stunts ,majorettes,a fun fair,field gun,a big raffle,a beer tent and stalls and funny games.
